chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
<speak>
    Letter to All Bishops Established Throughout the Province of Byzacena and Arzugitana <break time="500ms"/>by Saint Aurelius, Bishop of Carthage
</speak>
chunks.original_latin:
SANCTI AURELII
CARTHAGINENSIS EPISCOPI
EPISTOLA AD OMNES EPISCOPOS PER BYZACENAM
ET ARZUGYTANAM PROVINCIAM CONSTITUTOS. (Indidem pag 129). (C)
